globalProperty.description: This configuration maps an order type (order_type.name) to a location attribute type (location_attribute_type.name) to determine a requested/preferred location for a given order through order attribute (LOCATION_REFERENCE). If a location has such an attribute set (e.g. REFERRAL_RADIOLOGY_CENTER), and there exists a mapping through this configuration for an order's type (e.g. Radiology Order), then the order's requested/preferred location will be set to the location specified for the encounter/visit location. The configuration takes in multiple mappings separated by semicolon (format key1:value1; key2:value2). The maps are case sensitive. e.g - "RADIOLOGY ORDER:REFERRAL_RADIOLOGY_CENTER;LAB ORDER:REFERRAL_LABORATORY_CENTER"
